channel.title: Vac R&D Roadmaps and Reports
channel.description: Last 10 notes on Vac R&D Roadmaps and Reports

item.title: LibP2P mix protocol
item.description: vac:acz:ift:libp2p-mix-poc Description § This Milestone entails designing an anonymization layer for gossipsub, and by extension, IFT projects. The primary objective of this anonymization layer is to serve as a cohesive anonymization solution for gossip-based projects, with a specific focus on integrating it with the Logos projects Waku and Codex.

item.title: Applied Cryptography and Zero-knowledge Service Unit
item.description: vac:acz: § ift: § zerokit-v0.6 de-mls-poc libp2p-mix-poc waku: § RLN relay support codex: § nomos: § nes § nimbus: §.

item.title: proxy-re-encryption
item.description: vac:acz:consulting:codex:proxy-re-encryption § %%{ init: { 'theme': 'base', 'themeVariables': { 'primaryColor': '#BB2528', 'primaryTextColor': '#fff', 'primaryBorderColor': '#7C0000', 'lineColor': '#F8B229', 'secondaryColor': '#006100', 'tertiaryColor': '#fff' } } }%% gantt tickInterval 1month dateFormat YYYY-MM-DD section Status Proxy Re-Encryption: , 2024-05-27, 2024-09-30 status: 50% CC: Ramses + 1 Description § To embed and assist codex with their proxy re-encryption primitive.

item.title: Status RLN Usage
item.description: vac:acz:rlnp2p:status:rln-usage § %%{ init: { 'theme': 'base', 'themeVariables': { 'primaryColor': '#BB2528', 'primaryTextColor': '#fff', 'primaryBorderColor': '#7C0000', 'lineColor': '#F8B229', 'secondaryColor': '#006100', 'tertiaryColor': '#fff' } } }%% gantt tickInterval 1month dateFormat YYYY-MM-DD section Status RLN Usage: , 2024-05-13, 2024-06-13 status: 0% CC: Aaryamann Description § To describe an end-to-end user flow for a new user of the status app on how they can acquire an RLN membership.

item.title: Light RLN Verifiers
item.description: vac:acz:rlnp2p:vac:light-rln-verifiers § %%{ init: { 'theme': 'base', 'themeVariables': { 'primaryColor': '#BB2528', 'primaryTextColor': '#fff', 'primaryBorderColor': '#7C0000', 'lineColor': '#F8B229', 'secondaryColor': '#006100', 'tertiaryColor': '#fff' } } }%% gantt tickInterval 1month dateFormat YYYY-MM-DD section Status Light RLN Verifiers: done, 2024-03-01, 2024-05-01 status: 100% CC: Aaryamann Description § Make use of cryptography techniques to improve trust assumptions and reduce off-chain complexity while verifying RLN proofs.
